name: TheGreatThief
description:
The Story:-

Story set in Victorian Times”The Great Thief” tells a story about an Ethical Thief Notoriously named “The Shadow”. The Shadow Doesn’t Steals Money or expensive Items But The Bills passed By the Govt from the Evil Mr.Boss . The Shadow pass each level by collecting bills that are signed for sinister laws,Fight against The Evil Bosses and The Weapons Created by Mr.Boss .

The Great Thief is a SideScroller Adventure Platform Game,Where you take the role of A Great Ethical Thief which Run and Jump over the enemies and obstacles, Fight Mr. Boss and his evil inventions ,Come Take a Ride In this Action packed adventure .

Will Mr Shadow be able to Stop Mr Boss?

The Cast

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

        Mr.Shadow       Mr.Boss              Mr.Mushroom                    Mr.Caller

    (The Hero)        (The Evil Boss)    (Like a sir Mushroom)     (The Mystery assistant)

The Evil Minions

And A Big Squid

And Finally Various Machines
